post.author: ajm113
post.body:
http://www.gimp.org/ New website look.

GimpDownload GIMP 2.4.2 – Installer for Windows 2000 and above



I love the new version of it. Its a lot faster has a slightly better look. It also comes with new tools, and allows you to edit your selection if you want to resize it with one mouse drag on your image.

EDIT This thread mite belong in Pimping forum.
